5.1 Describe the user case

5.1.1 Our scientists uploaded a plain text file containing two samples of gene expression levels representing two experimental conditions.
5.1.2 System verifies whether the user input an invalid gene expression, if not the web application will return a page informing th e user to provide the correct format.
5.1.3 System calculates gene expression.
5.1.4 System will return a table of differentially expressed genes and a scatter plot.
